title: BIG FACTS feat. JACK HARLOW & DJ DRAMA
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. JACK HARLOW & DJ DRAMA
description:
LOVE is the topic of discussion on this edition of BIG FACTS. The crew is joined by DJ Drama who speaks on the infamous mixtape raid, Lil Uzi and more. Jack Harlow also joins BIG FACTS to talk social media, social injustice and more.

Visit www.bigfactspod.com

@BIGFACTSPOD on Instagram & Twitter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
